description: Main entry point for a Flutter application called 'Bookztron'. It sets up environment loading, dependency injection via providers, and app routing.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, sets up providers and routing.

methods.name: _router
methods.description: Creates and returns the app's routing configuration.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, providing dependencies and setting up MaterialApp.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes the environment and runs the app.
